title: Hard Rock Love
description: He’s my big sister’s best friend. This rock star god knows I’m off-limits. But is that a rule he’s willing to break? ---Seth Powers is wild. He’s devilish. He’s hot as sin.He’s also my big sister Everly’s best friend and a rock star drummer in one of the hottest bands around.My silly schoolgirl crush from years ago has turned into a burning desire. I crave his strong fingers caressing my skin. I long for his lips to capture mine.But if Everly has one rule when it comes to Seth, it’s this: Hands off my little sister.I know he wouldn’t break his friend’s trust like that.But with his lingering looks and his quick, intimate touches, I can’t help but wonder…Is that a rule Seth is willing to break?
author: Athena Wright
